info.title: News Aggregator System API
info.description: API Documentation for News Aggregator Application

get.description: Fetch distinct sources, authors, and categories from the articles table for filter options.

get.summary: Fetch articles with filters or by ID
get.description: Fetch a list of articles based on filters or fetch a specific article by its ID.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search in the article title or description

title.example: The Amsterdam Attacks and the Long Shadow of ‘Pogroms’

description.example: Many have used an old word to refer to recent events. Is it accurate?

get.description: Fetch a specific article by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the article to fetch

title.example: The Amsterdam Attacks and the Long Shadow of ‘Pogroms’

description.example: Many have used an old word to refer to recent events. Is it accurate?

post.summary: Log in a user and generate an access token
Log out the user by deleting the current access token
Send a password reset link to the user's email

404.description: Failed to send password reset link

message.example: Failed to send password reset link..!

post.summary: Reset the user's password using the provided token

message.example: We were unable to reset your password.

data.example: This password reset token is invalid.
We can't find a user with that email address.

get.summary: Get preferences for the authenticated user
get.description: This endpoint allows the authenticated user to retrieve their saved preferences for sources, categories, and authors.

post.summary: Set preferences for the authenticated user
post.description: This endpoint allows the authenticated user to set their preferences for sources, categories, and authors.

get.summary: Get personalized news feed based on user preferences
get.description: This endpoint allows the authenticated user to retrieve a personalized news feed based on their preferences for sources, categories, and authors.

title.example: The Amsterdam Attacks and the Long Shadow of ‘Pogroms’

description.example: Many have used an old word to refer to recent events. Is it accurate?

message.example: No articles found matching your preferences.
